creator: hay_dave@yahoo.com
text: The documentation I've seen for the SlowQueryInterceptor (http://people.apache.org/~fhanik/jdbc-pool/jdbc-pool.html#org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.interceptor.SlowQueryReport) indicate that it is supposed to log a message with level WARN when a slow query is detected or there is a failure.  However, it appears that no logging is ever done.  reportSlowQuery and reportFailedQuery simply record the event with the QueryStats object.  No call to the logging framework is ever made.
